oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1946-12-16 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of a performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on December 16, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Mary Lou; Dick Reinhart; Cimarron Kids; Hiram Higsby; Lem Hawkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Opening statements and theme / (1:41) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (1:58) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Mama Don’t Allow" / (4:19) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (4:51) Mary Lou performs "Halfway To Montana" / (6:48) Lem Hawkins and Hiram Higsby tell a joke / (7:10) Dick Reinhart performs "Sing Cowboy Sing" / (8:51) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (9:14) The Cimarron Kids perform "Columbus Stockade Blues" / (11:28) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (11:58) Hiram Higsby performs "Sing On Brother Sing" [unconfirmed] / (13:37) Lem Hawkins performs "[Unidentified banjo tune]" / (14:18) Allan Page announces show title and broadcast information
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; CBS Inc.; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); Davis, Chuck; Reinhart, Dick; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975;
